A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My review of Star Wars the Last jedi:
In general very nice to view!
The characters have a very nice structure and are played great.
The Humor was sometimes a bit over the top\, but it does work if you look at the whole.
Something I found a bit worse was the repetitive behavior in music.
Normally I love John Williams and the repetition works to a certain point. (mini spoiler: for example the use of the emperors theme at Snoke.)
The unexpected twists really make it a unique film.
In general\, supper to view!
Unfortunately\, my problem is not with the film\, but I am a little anxious about the split among fans.
With a score of 57% on rotten tomatoes among the viewers\, it is the film that has really divided the star wars fans.
Something I did not expect.
That is why Icall this out.
Let us argue with respect for someone else's opinion!
